FuncDef:
The smart-clock cable-delay command configures the feeder delay compensation value for the smart clock module of a GE optical interface.
The undo smart-clock cable-delay command restores the default configuration.
By default, the feeder delay compensation value of the Atom GNSS module on an interface is 0.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the feeder delay compensation value of the Atom GNSS module on a specified interface.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 65535, in ns.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
For the Atom GNSS module, every 1m feeder corresponds to 5 ns delay compensation value. To configure the feeder delay compensation value for the smart clock module of a GE optical interface, run the smart-clock cable-delay command.
Precautions
This command does not apply to the single-mode smart clock module.
